entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pinawa

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
